segment.source: AppLocker design guide (Windows 10)
segment.target: AppLocker design guide (Windows 10)

segment.source: This topic for the IT professional introduces the design and planning steps required to deploy application control policies by using AppLocker.
segment.target: This topic for the IT professional introduces the design and planning steps required to deploy application control policies by using AppLocker.

segment.source: AppLocker design guide
segment.target: AppLocker design guide

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: This topic for the IT professional introduces the design and planning steps required to deploy application control policies by using AppLocker.
segment.target: This topic for the IT professional introduces the design and planning steps required to deploy application control policies by using AppLocker.

segment.source: This guide provides important designing and planning information for deploying application control policies by using AppLocker.
segment.target: This guide provides important designing and planning information for deploying application control policies by using AppLocker.

segment.source: It is intended for security architects, security administrators, and system administrators.
segment.target: It is intended for security architects, security administrators, and system administrators.

segment.source: Through a sequential and iterative process, you can create an AppLocker policy deployment plan for your organization that will address your specific application control requirements by department, organizational unit, or business group.
segment.target: Through a sequential and iterative process, you can create an AppLocker policy deployment plan for your organization that will address your specific application control requirements by department, organizational unit, or business group.

segment.source: This guide does not cover the deployment of application control policies by using Software Restriction Policies (SRP).
segment.target: This guide does not cover the deployment of application control policies by using Software Restriction Policies (SRP).

segment.source: However, SRP is discussed as a deployment option in conjunction with AppLocker policies.
segment.target: However, SRP is discussed as a deployment option in conjunction with AppLocker policies.

segment.source: For info about these options, see Determine your application control objectives.
segment.target: For info about these options, see Determine your application control objectives.

segment.source: To understand if AppLocker is the correct application control solution for your organization, see Understand AppLocker policy design decisions.
segment.target: To understand if AppLocker is the correct application control solution for your organization, see Understand AppLocker policy design decisions.

segment.source: In this section
segment.target: In this section

segment.source: Topic
segment.target: Topic

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Understand AppLocker policy design decisions
segment.target: Understand AppLocker policy design decisions

segment.source: This topic for the IT professional lists the design questions, possible answers, and ramifications of the decisions when you plan a deployment of application control policies by using AppLocker within a Windows operating system environment.
segment.target: This topic for the IT professional lists the design questions, possible answers, and ramifications of the decisions when you plan a deployment of application control policies by using AppLocker within a Windows operating system environment.

segment.source: Determine your application control objectives
segment.target: Determine your application control objectives

segment.source: This topic helps you with the decisions you need to make to determine what applications to control and how to control them by comparing Software Restriction Policies (SRP) and AppLocker.
segment.target: This topic helps you with the decisions you need to make to determine what applications to control and how to control them by comparing Software Restriction Policies (SRP) and AppLocker.

segment.source: Create a list of apps deployed to each business group
segment.target: Create a list of apps deployed to each business group

segment.source: This topic describes the process of gathering app usage requirements from each business group in order to implement application control policies by using AppLocker.
segment.target: This topic describes the process of gathering app usage requirements from each business group in order to implement application control policies by using AppLocker.

segment.source: Select the types of rules to create
segment.target: Select the types of rules to create

segment.source: This topic lists resources you can use when selecting your application control policy rules by using AppLocker.
segment.target: This topic lists resources you can use when selecting your application control policy rules by using AppLocker.

segment.source: Determine the Group Policy structure and rule enforcement
segment.target: Determine the Group Policy structure and rule enforcement

segment.source: This overview topic describes the process to follow when you are planning to deploy AppLocker rules.
segment.target: This overview topic describes the process to follow when you are planning to deploy AppLocker rules.

segment.source: Plan for AppLocker policy management
segment.target: Plan for AppLocker policy management

segment.source: This topic for describes the decisions you need to make to establish the processes for managing and maintaining AppLocker policies.
segment.target: This topic for describes the decisions you need to make to establish the processes for managing and maintaining AppLocker policies.

segment.source: Create your AppLocker planning document
segment.target: Create your AppLocker planning document

segment.source: This planning topic for the IT professional summarizes the information you need to research and include in your AppLocker planning document.
segment.target: This planning topic for the IT professional summarizes the information you need to research and include in your AppLocker planning document.

segment.source: After careful design and detailed planning, the next step is to deploy AppLocker policies.
segment.target: After careful design and detailed planning, the next step is to deploy AppLocker policies.

segment.source: AppLocker Deployment Guide covers the creation and testing of policies, deploying the enforcement setting, and managing and maintaining the policies.
segment.target: AppLocker Deployment Guide covers the creation and testing of policies, deploying the enforcement setting, and managing and maintaining the policies.
